data.name: FixAndProtectTermsAndConditionsCheckboxEnergyLabelText
data.value:
By ticking this box, you confirm:

  1. You’re happy to enter into a binding contract with OVO (S) Gas Limited/OVO Electricity Limited for your gas/electricity supply and OVO (S) Home Services Limited for any Home Services products (and, for any insurance products, also AmTrust Europe Limited) for the SSE products you've selected.
  2. You’ve read and accept the {0} Terms and Conditions (which also includes a summary of the tariff) and the General Terms and Conditions for the Supply of Electricity and/or Gas, and the {2} and the {1} Insurance Product Information Document.
  3. You’ve provided accurate information (not doing so could invalidate your insurance).

You’ll get your switching details and Welcome pack via email. You can’t opt out of these emails. You’ll also receive a confirmation of sale letter for your {1} separately confirming your product start date. This will include your policy booklet with terms and conditions.

data.name: MarketingConsentTitle
data.value: We’d like to send you information about product offers, services and rewards from OVO Electricity Limited, OVO (S) Gas Limited, OVO (S) Home Services Limited, OVO (S) Metering Limited and OVO (S) Retail Telecoms Limited by email. We’ll always treat your data with respect, keep it safe and secure and never sell it to third parties. You can stop receiving these emails at any time by clicking ‘unsubscribe’ in your email.. If you want to receive these emails, please tick the box.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsCheckboxBroadbandBundleLabelText
data.value: By ticking this box, you confirm you’re happy to enter into a binding contract with OVO (S) Gas Limited/OVO Electricity Limited for your gas/electricity supply and OVO (S) Retail Telecoms Limited for your broadband and phone. You’ll get your switching details and Welcome pack via email. You can’t opt out of these emails.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsCheckboxEnergyLabelText
data.value: By ticking this box, you confirm you’re happy to enter into a binding contract with OVO (S) Gas Limited/OVO Electricity Limited for your gas/electricity supply. You’ll get your switching details and Welcome pack via email. You can’t opt out of these emails.

data.name: TermsAndConditionsCheckboxLabelText
data.value: We’re required to keep a record of your consent for a new contract for a fixed line service for 12 months. By ticking the box, you confirm you’re authorised to enter this contract. You also consent to us transferring your fixed line services, described by the details above, from your current supplier to SSE. You’ll get your switching details and Welcome pack via email. You can’t opt out of these emails.
